.. _usfm-paragraph_?:
.. index:: marker (?)

\\
^^^
:Markup: ``???``
:Type: paragraph
:Added: 1.0
:Use: Basic. |br|
	Extra description. |br|
	**\\? = \\?1** (see :ref:`syntax notes <syntax_numberedMarkers>` on numbered markers)

**Text and Formatting Sample** - ref (GNT)

.. code-block:: text
	:name: usfm-paragraph_??_example
	:emphasize-lines: #,#

	markup example
